shortInfo.0: LLP 'Magen Security Agency' has been operating in the security services market since 2012.
shortInfo.1: Over the years, we have gained extensive practical experience in organizing the security of various types of facilities.
shortInfo.2: Today, our clients include both large companies and small and medium-sized businesses.
shortInfo.3: The liability of our security services to clients is insured for 100,000,000 tenge.
shortInfo.4: There have been no claims for compensation from clients throughout our entire period of operation.

staff.p1: Special attention is given to the professional training of our security staff. We hire employees with prior experience in the security industry.
staff.p2: Monthly assessments include both theoretical knowledge tests and emergency response drills.
